evidence.claim: Inivata uses AWS for hosting their services.
Inivata is compliant with HIPAA standards for health data privacy.
Inivata implements FHIR standards for their healthcare data management.
Azure is mentioned as part of their technology stack for data services.
Integration patterns include API Integration and Data Integration for health tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or EDI processes.
